title: CultureFly Named as Flagship Merchandise Partner for Breakout Roblox Title 'Dandy's World'
description: CultureFly has been named the flagship merchandise partner for Dandy's World, the breakout Roblox title created by BlushCrunch Studio. Under this new partnership, CultureFly will develop and distribute a full range of licensed products, including plush, toys, apparel, accessories, and more, across major retail and digital platforms.
content:
Dandy's World to launch a global merchandise program across retail, e-commerce, and in-game platforms in 2025.

NEW YORK, Aug. 13, 2025 /PRNewswire/ -- CultureFly has been named the flagship merchandise partner for Dandy's World, the breakout Roblox title created by BlushCrunch Studio. Under this new partnership, CultureFly will develop and distribute a full range of licensed products, including plush, toys, apparel, accessories, and more, across major retail and digital platforms.

CultureFly will also launch and manage the brand's dedicated e-commerce storefront, delivering a comprehensive, end-to-end fan experience. Products will be available online and at leading retailers, including Walmart, Target, Amazon, Five Below, and others.

"I never imagined my ideas and artwork could inspire such a passionate and creative community," said Qwelver, the creator of Dandy's World. "CultureFly really gets what these characters mean to our fans, and that's why partnering made so much sense."

"We're thrilled to partner with BlushCrunch Studio to build a cross-platform merchandise experience that meets fans wherever they are online, in-store, or in-game" said Courtney Kaadi, Director of Licensing at CultureFly. The first wave of products is expected to debut in 2025.

About Dandy's World

BlushCrunch Studio is an independent studio best known for Dandy's World, a vibrant, character-driven survival game on Roblox. Created by Qwelver, the game blends stylized mascot horror survival with team-based social gameplay. Since its launch, Dandy's World has grown into a global fandom and recently surpassed 4 billion plays.

About CultureFly

CultureFly is a leading creator of officially licensed products for pop culture fans. With a fully integrated approach to product development, manufacturing, retail, and e-commerce, CultureFly delivers immersive fan experiences through collectible merchandise, subscription boxes, and custom programs for top entertainment properties.
summary: CultureFly has been named as the flagship merchandise partner for Roblox title Dandy's World, created by BlushCrunch Studio, set to launch a global merchandise program across retail, e-commerce, and in-game platforms in 2025. The partnership allows CultureFly to develop and distribute a range of licensed products, including plush, toys, apparel, accessories, and more, across major retail and digital platforms. Products will be available at leading retailers such as Walmart, Target, Amazon, Five Below, and others. The first wave of products is expected to debut in 2025 and will be managed by CultureFly.
shortSummary: CultureFly will be the flagship merchandise partner for BlushCrunch Studio's Dandy's World, launching a global merchandise program in 2025, aiming for immersive fan experiences.

argos_summary: CultureFly has been appointed as the flagship merchandise partner for Dandy's World, a popular Roblox game developed by BlushCrunch Studio. The partnership will see CultureFly create and distribute a variety of licensed products, including toys and apparel, available through retail and e-commerce platforms starting in 2025. The collaboration aims to enhance the fan experience by providing a comprehensive range of merchandise that resonates with the game's community.
